room_title: Escape room "Stumptown Speakeasy" by Stumptown Escape Games in Portland
room_address: 12550 SW Main Street, Suite 120, Tigard, OR 97223
room_description:
You have discovered that the mobster that runs the speakeasy you recently started working for is much more brutal than you originally thought. Even though he makes the best beer in town, you canâ€™t in good conscience let him continue to torture your coworkers. 

So, you have tipped off the cops and they will be there in just one hour to raid the joint. Not wanting to deny the world his tasty concoction, you have to find the jealously guarded secret recipe and leave the city so that you can open a kinder, gentler speakeasy in another town.
